Address.value: 30 CECIL STREET,19-08 PRUDENTIAL TOWER, SINGAPORE, Singapore

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Headquartered in Hong Kong, Happy City Holdings is a restaurant operator that operates three all-you-can-eat hotpot restaurant through its wholly-owned Operating Subsidiaries in Hong Kong. We have been in the restaurant services industry serving the Hong Kong market for over 5 years, our restaurants serving all-you-can-eat Thai and Japanese hotpot to our customers under the brand names "Thai Pot" and "Gyu Gyu Shabu Shabu". As of the date of this prospectus, we operate three restaurants located in Tsuen Wan District in the New Territories, Mong Kok District in Kowloon, and North Point District in Hong Kong Island.
